website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice for a dry brush that has the added bonus of a removable handle.
pros: This dry brush stands out with its balanced bristle texture, making it ideal for those who want a less coarse brush texture or who have sensitive skin
We love the removable handle because it makes the brush more versatile and able to be used on more areas of the body
cons: The longevity of the handle was an issue for some, and other consumers experienced shedding or matting of the bristles

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality!!! Don’t believe all the hype!
customer_reviews.text: This is badddddd. Such bad quality. Very poor quality bristles. Small size brush than other I owned and first to get that bad ever after 3 uses!!! I don’t brush hard as I have very very VERY sensitive skin butthe bristles all broke down and flaten after 2nd Use already. Didn’t even last at all already have to throw away. And I owned brush for at least months before using several times a week. But this one!!! Worst. Very sorry to have to write abad review but people should know what to expect! 2 stars for packaging and added hook and the nice bag it came with!
customer_reviews.author: Carine D

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: I just now got this in the mail and tried it once., it doesn't say attached to the handle. I know it's supposed to detach but it won't stay together when you want it to.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: It's in the handle shape!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased several other shower/back brushes, and this one is the best for me. All brushes seemed to have bristles that feel like an oak tree that bears use, and this one at first seemed rough, I think it has enough scrubbing power without leaving you bleeding. The handle does it for me: good size and shape to hold, and the brush head is angles correctly. I haven't used the removable brush head part separately from the handle, but I could see how that is a nice option to have. I will reorder this brush when I need another.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Im sold on dry brushing!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I waited to write this review for about a month so I could gove honest feedback. Verdict: Im so sold on dry brushing! I have had two kids and bought this to help with loose skin on my abdomen. I absolutely notice a difference! This brush is great because it has a long handle which can be removed as well. I have had no issues with bristles coming off. im in love!
customer_reviews.author: Lweck18

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really work for me. I thought it would be stiffer, and useful for my cellulite and even removing dead skin cells. Turned out to be nil for both. Have to return.
customer_reviews.author: angelarosie

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry brushing
customer_reviews.text: Handle is removable. Came with cute instructions for use and cleansing. Also can with a hook and a sack for storage. Seemed to do exactly what it’s supposed to. Not sure why one of the ratings is softness because it’s not supposed to be soft? Weird but seems to be a great product. Will update if it doesn’t hold up to regular use.
customer_reviews.author: CRoss24

customer_reviews.title: ... suitable for shower use after clicking through a few recommended tabs. However
customer_reviews.text: Full disclosure - I actually ordered this thinking it was a brush suitable for shower use after clicking through a few recommended tabs. However, I'm really pleased with my mistake! I use this brush every night before showering now after reading the instruction card this came with. I have very fair, very sensitive skin, but this brush feels amazing. The bristles are just the right ratio of soft to coarse and leave my skin feeling invigorated and refreshed. My other body products absorb much better now that I have an easy way to full-body exfoliate. Product quality is good too, the handle is sturdy and I haven't had any shedding issues with the bristles.
customer_reviews.author: Ari A.

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to slip the handle in and out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: This brush is exactly what I hoped it would be. The bristles are not too soft, not too rough. It is easy to slip the handle in and out of the hand-held brush and it holds together nicely when using the handle. I can recommend this brush.
customer_reviews.author: D. Tormey

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: The brush came in good condition, and I liked the travel bag. The brush doesn’t easily detach from the handle, so I just leave it on when brushing. I do see some improvement in my skin, but I haven’t used it long enough.. I know holistic methods take a long time, but I’m satisfied with the results so far.
customer_reviews.author: Vira

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It sheds terribly, by bathroom floor was covered with bristles after some light dry brushing
customer_reviews.author: Irene Z.

customer_reviews.title: This body brush is amazing - exfoliates your skin and makes it super soft
customer_reviews.text: This body brush is amazing - exfoliates your skin and makes it super soft, also cleaning you from head to toe! I don't have much experience using a dry brush so at first, I thought it was a bit rough on my skin, but after following the tips/instructions it comes with, I grew more comfortable with it and it is a part of my shower regimen! The wood handle makes it SO easy to exfoliate your back - so relaxing and a very important step that many people skip!
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: Other than that its of good quality. I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is well made. The only problem at the unwrapping was that it was hard to detach the hadle. I couldn’t separate the two pieces. After i added a bit of cocnut oil between the two pieces they came apart. Other than that its of good quality. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: TheTush

customer_reviews.title: Great dry brush
customer_reviews.text: Dry brushing was recommended to me by my mom. I did some research and this brush had great reviews. It arrives in a soft travel bag and a hook to mount on a door. The handle is great, easy to detach and stays on during use. There was a little bit of shedding of the bristles the first time I used it. But after the 2nd there was little to none. I use it once a day and I can feel a difference in my skin, along with other benefits. I'm going to buy a some as gifts this holiday season.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Burns

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I’m loving this brush! And I really like how I can just use the small brush and then add the handle when I need to brush my back. I was worried that the handle would not fit securely and/or come off too easily. But it works perfectly! It goes in for a tight fit and yet also is easy to remove. And the price is right too! I would recommend this to buy as a gift for friends!
customer_reviews.author: Christie Hansen

customer_reviews.title: excellent investment
customer_reviews.text: At first it was a little difficult to remove the brush head from the stick but with a little time it comes off with no problem. I wanted to get one of these for the summer specifically because it is hard to remove sunscreen residue with just bar soap or a loofa. This can get to all the hard to reach places and not feel like it is ripping your flesh off. I am super happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: rcollins

customer_reviews.title: Drybrush is awesome
customer_reviews.text: When I first bought this brush I thought it was a one for the shower. Low and behold it is not, which now I simply love it. Soft brush and l brush it all over my body. I wait just a few minutes and then step into the shower. I get out and my skin feels soft and silky. I’m a 67-year-old woman and I need this brush to help my old skin.
customer_reviews.author: Lokie

customer_reviews.title: Bristles too rough and they fall out.
customer_reviews.text: The brush itself works but the brush bristles are very hard and fall out. I recommend looking for a brush that is a LITTLE bit softer and doesn have bristles fall out constantly. From my research, i am not brushing too hard either.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Dry Brush
customer_reviews.text: I use this for dry brushing my skin, which promotes healthy skin regeneration. (Apparently this is super weird to some people who haven’t heard of dry brushing, but ya know, whatevs). It’s got a slight scratchy feel, which is what you want on a dry brush, but not too scratchy. You don’t want something super abrasive. This brush is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my first stab at dry brushing, so I’m no expert, but so far so good with this brush! Not too hard or too soft, just right. My only complaint is that the handle slides out too easy, wish it stayed in a little better.
customer_reviews.author: S. Butera

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush!
customer_reviews.text: I like this brush. You can use it with the handle or without. It's great for skin brushing and arrived in great condition. The handle was lose and came off pretty easily at first but I just pushed it in more and now it seems good. I really liked that they sent a hook to hang it on as well. I out it up right away! Skin brushing has many health benefits and it makes your skin very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Jeana C

customer_reviews.title: Not Worthy
customer_reviews.text: The quality is cheap. The handle broke in half the 1st day of being used and the strap was not even secured on both sides. I was traveling and don't have time to return it back, but will never buy her again.
customer_reviews.author: Lucci M

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Really love the brush. As a swim instructor I often end up with a lot of dead skin on my body and was left really dry. With this brush it really brushed it all away. The handle is great for hard to reach places such as the back. and with the detachable head with a strap its easy to use on more sensitive parts such as the torso and abdomen. I just use it before showering and im left with smoother better feeling skin. Packing was great too,, comes with a sack and even a wall hanger to hang it up when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon P.

customer_reviews.title: lovely brush and it feels so good to use it
customer_reviews.text: Lovely, lovely brush and it feels so good to use it! The seller contacted me with an email a couple of days after the brush shipped with detailed instructions on how to use. That was unexpected and very helpful. I was impressed. The brush is also packaged in its own drawstring cloth bag, which I will use to store it. Altogether very pleased and I definitely recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite Manor

customer_reviews.title: I'm kind of addicted??
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this brush. I haven't had it long enough to see if it reduces stretch marks and cellulite, but I can say it feels amazing. I thought it would be too rough on my skin but you can actually press pretty hard without it being uncomfortable. The handle is definitely useful in reaching the backside (a good long back scratch does the body good in my opinion) and I can already tell a difference in my skin's texture. And I don't know why but doing it before a shower makes it feel like the soap works better? This brush is great, have found zero downsides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Good Quality, Really Helps
customer_reviews.text: "I love this brush. I have been using it for two weeks and can already see a great difference in my skin's health. The bristles are just right, not too stiff. I am using less moisturizer because my skin feels so soft. I used to have itchy skin and that has cleared up as circulation has improved. I can tell a visible difference in the appearance of cellulite as well."
customer_reviews.author: EHB

customer_reviews.title: Bristles fall out easily. Several were even loose in the bag when ...
customer_reviews.text: Bristles fall out easily. Several were even loose in the bag when it arrived. Also, my last Wholesome Beauty brush came in a nice cotton bag and had Wholesome Beauty printed on the handle. This one with a clear plastic bag over the brush and didn't have any mention of it being a Wholesome Beauty brush, besides on the cheap label on the clear plastic bag. So I'm not even sure this isn't a knockoff.
customer_reviews.author: Shana Diehl

customer_reviews.title: This has been a great purchase. I always thought the answer was to ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great purchase. I always thought the answer was to exfoliate while showering. But then I read about dry brushing. Wow, what a difference. I spend more time than I should in the sun and using this dry brush has really improved the flaking and shedding of dry skin. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: bella

customer_reviews.title: Dry skin body brush
customer_reviews.text: I saw a clip on YouTube about this brush. I had to try it to see if it help with cellulite and wow it does. I brush the effected areas at least times a week. I want to increase to more but for now its working. It also removes the dead skin leaving your skin looking better.
customer_reviews.author: Fredia

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of dry brushes before I settled on this one. I wanted a long handle with the option of removing the brush because I wanted to brush my back. I couldn't brush my back without a long handle. The brush easily removes from the handle or re-installs easily. The bristles are natural and are not harsh on the skin. It feels good to brush. I am new to dry brushing, but am glad I started it. My skin is much softer and it will have positive effects on my health. A medical professional recommended that I start dry brushing. I thought it would take a lot of time, but it probably takes about 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Dry Brush!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for! The bristles are firm but not too firm and the handle helps me reach hard to reach places. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Dailey // @thelaurendailey

customer_reviews.title: Better than a Boyfriend
customer_reviews.text: Single like me and unable to reach all around your back? This dry brush removes all the itchy, dry skin on my middle back (and all other appropriate skin surfaces) under just my power. I wish I had purchased it long ago and said goodbye to winter skin way before. Top notch buy!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany A Noble

customer_reviews.title: Great brush!
customer_reviews.text: I read about the importance of dry skin bushing and was curious as to whether it would truly benefit me. Well, I'm very glad I invested in this brush! It's wonderful. The bristles are stiff, but not painful. The optional handle makes brushing hard to reach places very accessible. This brush makes dry skin brushing a very pleasant experience.
customer_reviews.author: Sun Goddess

customer_reviews.title: This dry skin brush is great.
customer_reviews.text: I have used dry skin brushes in the past and have liked what they do for my skin. Dry brushing is a great exfoliant. Aftrr using the brush it leaves your skin feeling smooth. So I decided to buy this brush. What I like about this brush is the ability to use it with or without the long handle. Sometimes the handle gets in the way but sometimes it is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Self Care Tool! Do it!
customer_reviews.text: This great skin care tool is part of self care. You can remove the bruch from the stick if desired. I haven't used it consistently enough to see a marked difference but the product is quality made.
customer_reviews.author: OutAndAbout

customer_reviews.title: This brush is a winter survival must
customer_reviews.text: More than a back scratcher--alhtough great for that--this brush is part of a quick routine for dry skin. Brush upward strokes entire body before shower. That is it (then moisturizer fully after shower!). Gross but true--we flake. Spa like and quick. Have bought for myself and as presents for girlfriends. Quick service, great price and quality
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: great bristles
customer_reviews.text: this is a nice brush and nice you can purchase refills. I had a little issue with the brush staying on the handle but if you REALLY TAP it down it stays better. I though having the handle and brush separate was a nice touch for replacement. I like the bristles very easy on skin.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia m larson

customer_reviews.title: You can do better
customer_reviews.text: I love dry brushing and have used different units in the past. This is the worst. Handle is flimsy and head is small. On the plus side it looks nice and price is inexpensive. For a unit like this I will pay more for a more effective product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I am new to dry brushing, so I have nothing else to compare this brush to, however it completely met my expectations. The bristles are the perfect firmness, and I particularly enjoy the design which allows for removal of the long stick. Feels good, and it is slowly but surely removing all my dry, winterized skin. Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: KarenR

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The company sent me an email before I even receive the brush advising me how to start. This was great. They wanted to make sure that you don’t start too rough because it can cause soreness. I then received the brush and I have noticed an improvement in my skin. I get blimishes on my chest from sweat when working out and sometimes on my arms, and since using this brush I have seen less of that! I’m very pleased. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Feels so good. Love this! I have the small one as well. But this helps reach my back which I’m happy about.
customer_reviews.author: Amishi

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only used is a few times. The detachable brush kept falling off the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: This brush is very nice for dry brushing (as recommended in "The Prime")
customer_reviews.text: This brush is very nice for dry brushing (as recommended in "The Prime"). I have extremely sensitive skin and use it on my ankles, knees and elbows. I think this brush along with silk gloves has gotten rid of my knee pain. It's so inexpensive and high quality. A rare combination in this day and age. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: SheriB

customer_reviews.title: Quality has declined considerably
customer_reviews.text: I just repurchased this after owning the original for 3+ years; I have to say I was very disappointed when I opened it and saw the quality. The brush head is smaller, the bristles were already coming out, and overall the density of the bristles was much more sparse than the prior one I had.
customer_reviews.author: julu25

customer_reviews.title: exactly as described....only one issue
customer_reviews.text: great brush. I am on my second one. The only thing I don't like and would change is the cloth around the handle. While I understand why it's there for comfort when holding it, it builds up mold VERY quickly if you mainly use this in the shower. What I did was use a blade to cut the cloth off which helps keep in sanitary longer.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love skin brushing. At the end of the day, my legs feel heavy and are at times swollen. I sit down and start brushing from my toes up and feel instantly better. And it's relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Borden

customer_reviews.title: Skeptic Turned Believer!  And being able to brush my back?  Priceless!
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction...just right bristles.. Saw results in two weeks. My dermatologist stated that cellulite (orange peel like dimples on the thigh, butt and under arms) is really only skin deep and that dry brushing was the best remedy. I concur.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marie

customer_reviews.title: This dry brush is perfect! It is not too stiff
customer_reviews.text: This dry brush is perfect! It is not too stiff, but just perfect. It arrived quickly and I was pleasantly surprised that they included a hook to mount it on the wall. I have used it for dry brushing already and will also use is to scrub my back while washing in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: molly

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I have had other back brushes before both for use as a dry brush (as this one is) and for in-shower use. While my preference is for natural brushes, I have found that nylon bristles are best to wet use. For dry use, this brush is perfect. It is just the right type of bristles, neither too firm, not too soft. It offers just the right feel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this brush!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great brush at a great price. Have had no major issues so far with bristles. A very few have fallen off here and there but that's to be expected. This brush is fairly gentle so I'm guessing that some of the reviewers who've said it hurts when using must have extremely sensitive skin. Overall, this has been a great product that I've recommended to others as well! Would definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brushes!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these dry brushing brushes. Just the right texture for dry brushing. This package has 2 brushes, a hand held one and a long handle brush for hard to reach areas like the middle of your back. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: EILEEN S.

customer_reviews.title: Great brush! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush! Makes my skin super soft and feel so good. I use it everyday. The only thing that annoys me about this brush is that sometimes it can hurt a little and the bristles sometimes come off. other than that, it was an AWESOME purchase, I will be getting another when or if I need a new one in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Easy and effective
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brush for a couple of weeks about every other day. My skin is softer and I love the exfoliation. It only takes 3 minutes and I use it before I shower.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Works Wonders!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for 2 reasons. 1 is to brush my skin prior to using the tanning bed and the second reason is to help produce collagen. It works wonders for both purposes! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Milbourn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it has really helped with the circulation in my arms and legs.
customer_reviews.author: bowen

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a good brush for dry brushing. This was perfect. I love that I comes with a hook so I can hang it up in my shower and it's able to come on and off the long brush for use on smaller body areas.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Send this back. The bristles are to soft and ...
customer_reviews.text: Send this back. The bristles are to soft and bend and I don't think they would effectively exfoliate anything.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I found that this works better than lotion for dry skin, especially on the legs. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: CLT

customer_reviews.title: Soft smooth skin
customer_reviews.text: Noticed a difference in my skin after the first use. It's super soft and smooth. The secret is light strokes. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Great sleep is just a brush away!
customer_reviews.text: The bristles were soft yet effective. It was for my daughter. I was worried it would be too rough on her sensitive skin, but she absolutely loved it! I'm buying a few more for friends and definitely one for myself. The difference in her skin and sleep are surprisingly apparent. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 in 1 - Not For Me
customer_reviews.text: The brush head will not come off the long handle. The bristles though are perfect for dry brushing so I will be keeping this product.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Russell

customer_reviews.title: Works great to help detox and keep skin smooth and soft
customer_reviews.text: Works great to help detox and keep skin smooth and soft. I use 3-5 minutes duration before showering and then use my lotion after my shower.
customer_reviews.author: COCONNELL

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Versatile Brushes
customer_reviews.text: Love its versatility...two brushes in one! Works well brushing back and other hard to reach body parts.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Broke first time
customer_reviews.text: First use, the handle snapped off the brush. The brush by itself is good, but if you really want a brush with a long handle like this, do yourself a favor and get a slightly sturdier one.
customer_reviews.author: Raine Myrvold

customer_reviews.title: Not made well
customer_reviews.text: The handle broke the first time I used it. I bought my daughter one and it was deliver today. Hopefully it doesn’t break. Well her’s broke as well. I was asked to send it back in. It more trouble than its worth
customer_reviews.author: verdenia felder

customer_reviews.title: Feels good and your skin
customer_reviews.text: I like the flexibility to be able to use this on the extended handle or without it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah D. Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: I see that the skin on my hands and legs ...
customer_reviews.text: I see that the skin on my hands and legs look glowing & healthier. I am a senior with dry skin. I have used several lotions over the years & none have helped. I have purchased a second brush for a friend as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie P Walker

customer_reviews.title: My first brush
customer_reviews.text: I've never used one of these before, but by early indications, it seems to be good quality. Definitely a good feel on the skin!
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Andre

customer_reviews.title: Little rough
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for dry brushing and the bristles are a bit rough. Also couldn't get the arm back on after I took it off but that could just be user error.
customer_reviews.author: Rujio

customer_reviews.title: Feels good!
customer_reviews.text: I feel as I get older, my skin is slower to regenerate and needed help. I like how this feels before I shower and feel that it helps with brushing the dead skin cells off. I will have to see how this does long term for lymphatic circulation.
customer_reviews.author: JY.J

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It works as it is supposed to. Yes the hand brush does slip off the handle but that doesn’t bother me. If it does I will get some serious wood glue and seal it together
customer_reviews.author: SusyErnie

customer_reviews.title: Wifey got to the package before I could,. ...
customer_reviews.text: Wifey got to the package before I could,.......haven't seen it since. She's got her "claim" on it I guess! ;>) >>>>>M<<<<<
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price and product as advertised
customer_reviews.text: First time trying out dry brushing and still not positive about all the advertised benefits. But, the product is as described. It's good quality, and the bristles have not fallen out for me yet. The instructions that came with it were very clear. I dry brush a couple days a week, and I do think it helps with exfoliating, even if nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: Hana

customer_reviews.title: Awesome back scrubber/scratcher!
customer_reviews.text: This is an wesome back scrubber! My back constantly itches and this is the only thing for my shower that scrubs my back and makes it feel better. The only issue was keeping the brush and handle together, so I glued them. Now it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had never heard of this before. My therapist recommended it. It feels good when I use it. I can feel the tingling of blood moving.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Lazarus

customer_reviews.title: Great item! Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this body brush twice since it arrived and I've been satisfied both times. I feel it gives a great deep clean and my skin is always so soft after I use it, even without lotion! This brush with a nice body lotion after is the ultimate formula for smooth skin forever!
customer_reviews.author: samantha scardino

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush for Soft Skin
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my new Dry Skin Brush. I watched a youtube video to see how to use it, and I do use it every morning before I shower. It leaves my skin so soft and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Lollieme

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The brush is just the right texture for dry brushing without being too hard or scratchy. I also love that it detaches from the handle as that makes it easier to brush.
customer_reviews.author: kimberlee crist

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The brush came as you can see in the photos, with deformed bristles, and when they try to use it I realized that the bristles, besides being very hard, fall easily.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Reyes

customer_reviews.title: ... to but this brush appears to be a very good quality and it feels very nice
customer_reviews.text: I've never done dry brushing before so I have nothing to compare it to but this brush appears to be a very good quality and it feels very nice.
customer_reviews.author: kcm

customer_reviews.title: Probably better brushes on the market but not bad
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 7 months with daily use for dry brushing...not sure if that is better or worse than average but it is relatively inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: kpkendall

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great length. you can make it short by removing the handle. Bristle are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: prak

customer_reviews.title: Removable handle
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I dislike is the removable handle. I did not mean to buy that type, but it works fine. Sometimes it slips off the handle while hanging in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S. Bass

customer_reviews.title: Great brush! Serves it’s purpose
customer_reviews.text: Great brush! Serves it’s purpose! I’ve been using it for weeks now and haven’t noticed any loose or lost bristles. It’s an awesome little brush for your skin. The handle makes it easier to reach your back and you don’t have to bend over as much either. I’d purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush
customer_reviews.text: I use this for lymphedema of the legs. Works well, though sometimes the brush head does come off, which is not big deal to put back on.
customer_reviews.author: Rose648

customer_reviews.title: too soft
customer_reviews.text: not what I expected the bristles are too soft to work as a dry skin brush
customer_reviews.author: Willis H Harris

customer_reviews.title: feels great
customer_reviews.text: I'm hoping this brush will decrease the cellulite or at least the look of it in my legs. It just plain feels great.The long handle makes it easy to get all the way down to your toes. The brush head is detachable and sometimes comes off. It is suppose to so it goes back on easily.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Scott

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably Priced and Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I've been using for about a week. For me, a week doesn't seem long enough to tell if I'm actually receiving the health benefits that people say come with dry brushing. However, I do like the brush. I like that the handle is long so I can reach my back and that you can take the handle off if you need to. I don't really notice many bristles falling out as you would expect when you start using a brush like this. I think it's reasonably priced for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality !
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality!! The bristles started falling out after just 2 -3 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality and the bristles are just right for skin ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and the bristles are just right for skin brushing -- not too abrasive, but they do exfoliate. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kiki Delahaut

customer_reviews.title: Great thing !
customer_reviews.text: Great thing, as expected! Fast delivery and good packaging !!
customer_reviews.author: jalil m.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for dry brushing
customer_reviews.text: nice product for dry bruising. It leaves your skin soft and smooth
customer_reviews.author: Jamie J

customer_reviews.title: Natural bristles and detachable handle
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It's natural bristles creates a more gentle brush against the skin. I love how the handle easily detaches and reattaches to the brush making it a great all-over body brush. After just a couple of uses, I could feel the difference in my body.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Wimpy!
customer_reviews.text: This is the wimpiest dry brush ever. It is supposed to come off it’s handle for easy brushing and it doesn’t. It comes with an adhesive hook to hang on and even that won’t stay stuck on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Marcel M.

customer_reviews.title: This brush is nice, firm but not too firm
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping and even though I did not have a problem, the company sent me an email to follow to see if there were any problems. This brush is nice, firm but not too firm. I would buy other products from this company.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dupree

customer_reviews.title: Handle won't stay attached.
customer_reviews.text: The brush bristles are what I was looking for, but the brush won't stay attached to the handle. It is poorly designed. 😕
customer_reviews.author: JRS

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Can't get to attach to handle, would send back but would cost more than worth
customer_reviews.author: Dawn  Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Dry Brushing Never Felt So Good!
customer_reviews.text: I love this body brush. It reaches everywhere! It leaves your skin smooth and silky.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Austin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Brush
customer_reviews.text: Very nice brush- I gave it 4 stars because it was stiff enough for me. Otherwise it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Schmookaloo

customer_reviews.title: Great brush!
customer_reviews.text: The brush makes my skin feel so soft after I'm done. Not too hard and not too soft. Perfect for dry brushing. My husband is asking for one now so he can try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Shamroc290

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality brush. The long handle is sturdy and makes dry brushing easier. It is packaged to to keep the brush sanitary. It is wrapped in a cloth drawstring bag which is inside another plastic wrapping. It also comes with a plastic hook for hanging for your convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Tpez

product_meta.title: Dry Skin Body Brush 16"- Natural Bristle - For Dry Brushing - Detachable Handle -Removes Dead Skin & Toxins, Helps Cellulite, Lymphatic Functions, Blood Circulation & Exfoliation-Pouch & Hook Included
product_meta.description:
"The Secret to Healthy, Beautiful Skin" Do you want to have healthy, smooth, flawless and beautiful skin? Wholesome Beauty's Dry Skin Brush is your solution! It is the best dry skin brush out there. We guarantee it and so do our customers. "THE BRUSH PEOPLE OF ALL AGES SWEAR BY" * Smoother skin - Use the dry skin brush and feel your skin getting softer and smoother
* Exfoliates - removes dead dry skin, improving appearance, clearing your clogged pores, and allowing your skin to "breathe." 
* Reduce Cellulite - softens hard fat deposits below the skin while distributing fat deposits more evenly to diminish the appearance of cellulite.
* Stimulate Your Lymphatic System
* Warning: Many people become "addicted" to dry skin brushing (in a good way) because it simply feels so good. Along with glowing and tighter skin, regular dry skin brushers report feeling invigorated after a quick session.

Wholesome Beauty Dry Skin Brush features:
* Made with natural bristles of the finest grade 
* High Quality wood handle 
* Travel Pouch included
* Stick-on hook included

Wholesome Beauty Dry Skin brush is the ONLY brush backed by a No-Hassle Money-Back Guarantee to ensure 100% Satisfaction. 

So what are you waiting for? Click on the Buy button to order your brush now.
feature_bullets: HIGHEST QUALITY - Unlike other brushes Wholesome Beauty's brush is made of the highest quality materials only;The handle is made of smooth polished wood and the 100% Natural Bristles are of the finest grade
HOOK & TRAVEL BAG INCLUDED - We include a hook and travel bag with each brush for easy and convenient storage and travel, brush also has cotton loop for hanging
2 in 1: This brush could either be used with the long handle for easy reach or the handle can be removed and it can be used as palm brush

GREAT RESULTS - Our brush has shown great results for the skin's health and beauty when dry brushing; Benefits include: cellulite appearance reduction , smoother glowing skin, improves blood circulation, shed dead skin, eliminates clogged pores for better nutrients absorbing
NO RISK - Wholesome Beauty offers a 100% MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE to ensure complete satisfaction
